summary: Completed comprehensive testing of VPerfumes delivery tracking system. Backend APIs working 100%, frontend UI fully functional with beautiful Arabic interface. All core features tested successfully including admin/company authentication, order management, search/filters, and audit trail.

fixed_issues.fix_applied: Added ObjectId filtering in history data before JSON serialization

minor_warnings.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility
minor_warnings.impact: Accessibility warning only, functionality not affected

passed_tests: Admin dashboard loading and statistics display
Company dashboard with proper Arabic branding
Order creation with all required fields
Admin viewing all orders from multiple companies
Search functionality (order number, customer name, phone)
Proper access control (companies see only their orders)
Arabic UI with proper RTL layout
